module.name: REST Module
module.author: Burke Mamlin
module.description: Very Basic OpenMRS REST Module. Provides access to parts of the OpenMRS API in a REST-ful manner (currently only patient lookup). Access can be limited by IP address via a global property. Uses HTTP authentication (only recommended for use on servers that use SSL...use of non-SSL servers would broadcast HTTP authentication insecurely).

privilege.name: Access REST API
privilege.description: Allows user to access REST API functions

globalProperty.description: Whitespace-separated list of remote IP addresses allowed to access the RestModule API. Each entry should be four numbers (0-255) separated with periods, using "*" for wildcards - e.g., "192.168.1.* 192.168.2.50" allows all clients with IP addresses beginning with 192.168.1 plus the IP address 192.168.2.50.
The maximum number of results to return from any query to the RestModule API. Should be a whole number. If blank or zero, then no maximum number of results is imposed.
